main event: On 18th June 1958 in Pecos, Texas, a ground-visual sighting of a bright object, the size of a dime, white to red, moving slowly on the East and then straight up was reported.
interesting points: The object was described as being the size of a dime, changing colors from white to red, with bright orange in between, and emitting vapor in the rear.
Its course of movement was observed to change from flying east to going south, then changing to north to east, and finally going straight up.
The sighting was made by a Captain from the Pecos Police Department in Texas from Building 232 in Pecos, Texas.
The weather and winds-aloft conditions at the time and place of the sighting were reported as clear with no winds and 6/8 cloud coverage.
The report also includes telephonic communication details and references to military and intelligence units such as the 582nd ACURON at Las Cruces AFS NM and the Air Tech Intelligence Center.
sighted object: bright object changing from white to red, emitting vapor
witnesses: Captain from the Pecos Police Department
